description: Hi, I'm Gwyn! Cloud Developer Advocate at Microsoft and YouTuber. I'm passionate about introducing people to the Cloud Computing and creating friendly and concise content. When I'm not doing Advocate things, I'm probably playing video games (Big fan of Days Gone, Far Cry, and Sleeping Dogs), hanging out with my family, friends, or eating mint chocolate chip ice cream.
detailOrQuote: I'm passionate about introducing people to the Cloud Computing and creating friendly and concise content.
